name: Space Destroyer (linkedliszt)
description:
I only found out about this jam a few days ago, so I worked on this for like three days. All of the asteroids and enemy ships crash into each other, so there's not a whole lot of work for you to do.

Built using libgdx and kotlin.

Thanks to Kenney for the great and free assets: https://kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux

Source: https://github.com/jakewilson/space_destroyer
